name: Leo's Adventure
description:
A short game about a cat named Leo and it's quest to find it's toy pet mouse and return home! 

More levels to be added soon! Adding new ones weekly :). 

Message me on Discord (Yanitee#3563) if you manage to find any bugs!

NOTE: 
The game is obfiscated in pyarmor, leading to it sometimes being flagged as a false positive to your antivirus (even bigger professional games have this problem), if you have issues running the game make sure to make a exception in your anti virus software to be able to run it! Have fun!
